frame.name: Getting_up
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Protagonist</fen> leaves the place where they have slept, their <fen>Bed</fen>, to begin or resume domestic, professional, or other activities. Getting up is distinct from Waking up, which is concerned only with the transition from the sleeping state to a wakeful state.
<ex><fex name="pro">I</fex> <t>rose</t> <fex name="bed">from bed</fex>, threw on a pair of camouflage shorts and drove my little Toyota Corolla to a construction clearing a few miles away.</ex> <ex>One recent Monday, for example, <fex name="pro">Joe</fex> <t>rose</t> <fex name="bed">from bed</fex> <fex name="tim">extra early</fex> <fex name="pur">to catch an administrator at 8:30 am</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="cir">In the summer</fex> <fex name="pro">I</fex> <t>get</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="tim">early</fex> and get some miles in on my bike before the kids and Ange wake up. <fex name="bed">INI</fex></ex>
<ex>He slept or threw up the whole day. <fex name="pro">He</fex> <t>got</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="dur">for 2 hours</fex> <fex name="tim">in the evening</fex>. <fex name="bed">INI</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="cir">When it snowed</fex> <fex name="pro">Smithers</fex> <t>got</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="tim">before everyone else</fex> <fex name="tim">at two o'clock</fex> and swept the walkways. <fex name="bed">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person or animal that has slept in a particular place and now leaves it to engage in other activities.
<ex> <fex name="pro">Melony</fex> <t>got</t> <t>up</t> from bed and changed clothes getting ready to go to the doctor.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Bed
FE.definition:
<def-root>The place where the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has slept.
<ex>She <t>got</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="bed">from bed</fex> lazily and stretched her body and yawned.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> leaves their place of sleeping.
<ex>We <t>got</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="tim">at 6:30 in the morning</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> gets out of <fen>Bed</fen>.
<ex>I <t>rose</t> from bed <fex name="pur">to rectify the situation</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the event (or state) which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (<ment>probably</ment>, <ment>presumably</ment>, <ment>mysteriously</ment>), secondary effects (<ment>quietly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). It may also indicate salient characteristics of the Protagonist that affect the action (<ment>eagerly</ment>, <ment>carefully</ment>).
<ex> I <t>rose</t> from bed <fex name="Manner">with urgency</fex> early one morning because a light clicked on.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: New_situation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>New_situation</fen> is the situation the <fen>Protagonist</fen> finds him or herself in upon getting up from <fen>Bed</fen>.
<ex>Hannibal admitted defeat at around 5 am and <t>rose</t> <fex name="New_situation">to find Face and Ray already up making coffee</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Circumstances</fen> encodes a setting, often temporal or spatial, within which the getting up event takes place.
<ex><fex name="cir">During spring break</fex>, we <t>got</t> <t>up</t> at 7:45 and waited for the donut truck.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>A state of affairs that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is responding to in getting up.
<ex>I <t>get</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="Explanation">because I have things I can't wait to do</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration_of_final_state
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of the interval for which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is not in <fen>Bed</fen> after getting up.
<ex>I was so tired yesterday that I went home and slept 3 hrs, <t>got</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="dur">for 2 hrs</fex>, then back to bed.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s <fen>Bed</fen> is situated.
<ex>We eventually ended up getting home about 5am and I ended up sleeping all day. <fex name="pro">I</fex> <t>got</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="tim">late</fex> <fex name="pla">at home</fex>, went to Steve's and slept at his house. <fex name="bed">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: rise.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: get up from bed after sleeping

lexUnit.name: get up.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: rise from bed after sleeping
